item.description:
JREX Halloween Party at Itadaki

Come to our very first JREX Costume Halloween Fundraising Party! Do you live in America but have never gone out in costume on Halloween night, or have a cool costume but haven’t had time to use it? Now’s your chance!
There will be a costume contest judged by our special guests. Come win fantastic prizes! Meet awesome people!
Prizes include a pair of food vouchers for Yakitori Zai, a voucher for a basket-making lesson at the GrayMist studio in Nantucket, a coupon for a free clam chowder from Turner’s Fisheries, and a all you can eat voucher from the new amazing ramen shop in Porter Sq., Yume Wo Katare!

Time： October 27, Saturday 5pm
Meeting place：George Washington Statue at Boston Public Garden, everyone walks together to Itadaki Boston (http://www.itadakiboston.com/)

Fees：$35 （JREX Member:$30）
Price includes food. Drinks are COD

Please register by 10/22 online directly at www.JREX.us and not at this Meet Up site.

 

* Yoyaku wa chokusetsu  www.JREX.us  made onegaishimasu.
item.name: JREX Halloween Party
